attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown, UK PM I know you are crossing a hard time amoung your ministry and for that reason, I would like you know as a Brazilian citizen that respect so much you and the UK's Queen, I'm praying for you all...
May God bless you
Mr Brando

rejection.details: If you wish to write to the Prime Minister, you can find the correct contact details here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
